data.message:
Not that Eminem will ever see this... But listening to his old albums vibing... What is this new shit? Eminem is dead. Marshall Mathers is dead. Slim Shady is dead. Time to change your name again because this stuff you're putting out now is garbage. 

"Till I collapse I'm spillin' these raps long as you feel 'em
Till the day that I drop you'll never say that I'm not killin' 'em
‘Cause when I am not, then I'ma stop pennin' 'em
And I am not hip hop and I'm just not Eminem"
